description: OpsGenieConfig configures notifications via OpsGenie. See https://prometheus.io/docs/alerting/latest/configuration/#opsgenie_config

actions.description: Comma separated list of actions that will be available for the alert.

apiURL.description: The URL to send OpsGenie API requests to.

api_key.description: The secret's key that contains the OpsGenie API key. It must be at them same namespace as CRD fallback to global setting if empty

details.description: A set of arbitrary key/value pairs that provide further detail about the incident.

entity.description: Optional field that can be used to specify which domain alert is related to.

priority.description: Priority level of alert. Possible values are P1, P2, P3, P4, and P5.

responders.description: List of responders responsible for notifications.

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

source.description: Backlink to the sender of the notification.

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags attached to the notifications.

update_alerts.description: Whether to update message and description of the alert in OpsGenie if it already exists By default, the alert is never updated in OpsGenie, the new message only appears in activity log.
